trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Coachella
There were no other sightings in Coachella on or around May 11th 2013
divs: sighting detailsit was around 1:05 a.m. and had been on facebook. i poked my head out the patio door to listen to the mockingbird that was singing. i was taken aback by this very bright rectangular light in the distance. i live on the golf course tee and it looked to be at about the putting hole. my first thought was, "what's that doing there?". it was a large, vertical, rectangular object that was brightly lit as if with led lights. it seemed to have the structure of a box kite. there were some secondary lights on the edges (or coming from within) that looked a little reddish\bluish and projected off of it... kind of starry and flickery. like if you were squinting at a led yard light. but this was up in the air about 100 to 500 feet. it appeared to travel closer and looked about the size of a semi truck trailer when it stopped a few hundred feet from me. i had turned off the patio light and walked into the yard to observe it at different angles. when it got closer i realized it was not something normal and i wanted to take a picture. by the time i got my cell phone and came back out (15 seconds)it was gone. it didn't appear to have passed by my house as i looked in other directions. it made no noise and my two dogs and the noisy mockingbird were totally unaware. i never felt threatened just dumbstruck over what seemed to be hovering in front of me. it made no more sense to me than if i had seen a large billboard "floating" over the golf course in the middle of the day! this is my first time to see something like this. i do believe in the possibility of ufos but never expected this to happen to me. this morning i am trying to find an explanation or dismiss it as a trick of the eye. but i just can't get over how strong it's presence was. big, bright and so quiet!
Summary: rectangular structure like a vertical box kite with bright lighted surface and small flickering light points.
